item.title: Senior Core Developer (walnut creek)
item.description:
Our Company is expanding its development staff and has the following opening in Pleasant Hill, CA . The company is seeking a self-starter who can develop innovative solutions to challenging problems in navigation, routing, data analysis, and visual display of complex information. Under general supervision and part of a team, this individual will perform development of advanced, technically complex systems, to include design, application development, testing, releasing, installation, and maintenance of software. The ability to adapt solutions from one environment to another, addressing new capabilities and system integration problems, is required. The candidate will work in a fast paced development environment producing high performance, highly parallel, scalable software for analyzing data to generate and deliver high quality road traffic information and location based services.

Required:

 Bachelors degree in Computer Science/Computer Engineering with an engineering/math focus or other equivalent field of discipline
 Demonstrated expertise in scientific programming with Java, C, C++, or similar high-level language
 Strong math, analytical and problem solving skills
 Ability to support multiple projects within the organization
 Highly motivated to learn new and existing technologies, detail oriented and highly responsible
 Full life cycle development, understands OO principles
 Solid communications skills
 Excellent Java programming skills


Desired:
 Masters or PhD in Computer Science/Computer Engineering with engineering/math focus or other equivalent field of discipline
 5+ years of experience in practical system development and deployment
 7 to 10 years of Java development
 Experience with Python, MATLAB
 Experience with Linux/Unix
 Experience with GIS, navigation, routing and traffic management
 Experience with mobile communication systems


We offer very competitive pay, performance-based bonus, stock option plan and healthcare.
